experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.description: Engineering a flexible 3D rendering program for psycholinguistics and using it to compare human and large language model behaviors on spatial reasoning under the Waterloo CompLING Lab.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Researcher
experiences.description: Researched social media discussions on diseases using data collection tools and machine learning models for sentiment analysis and topic modeling at the Artificial Intelligence and Mathematical Modeling Lab. First-authored a research paper awaiting official publishment on JMIR.

experiences.title: Freelance AI Trainer
experiences.description: Worked on paid tasks including prompt engineering and model evaluation to train and improve AI models.

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer Intern
experiences.description: Assisted in the development of an educational website that allows students to practice various math problems and uses machine learning to analyze their progress and improve their learning.
